alert.note: Alert for Carter; Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 03 at 7:06PM EST until February 04 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Snow accumulations of up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of three tenths to three quarters of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Ohio and northeast Kentucky. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Expect widespread power outages and tree damage due to the ice. Travel could be impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
